name: A Blade, Yet Not a Blade

system.description: You may use your pact weapon as a spellcasting focus for warlock spells, and the following eldritch invocations can be used on attacks with your pact weapon in addition to @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.ulmcmf3ofmpzmgzf]{Eldritch Blast}: @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.gxe8tx6gip6p084g]{Eldritch Grasp}, @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.2rfb3j6xsjn5hi24]{Eldritch Elementalism} (applying only to the bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage of the weapon itself, not bonus damage of other types form magic weapons or class abilities), @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.q3w500g29z8pkwoq]{Eldritch Tentacle}, and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.1yyq4vdsrc45u5t3]{Repelling Blast}.
